Module college.student_records
Package college.mtu_test

Class DatabaseTest

java.lang.Object
college.mtu_test.DatabaseTest
public class DatabaseTest extends Object
Test class for the Database class. This class tests the functionality of the database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseTest

      public DatabaseTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment by creating a Database object and obtaining a connection. Preconditions: The database must be running and accessible.

    • testDatabaseConnection

      public void testDatabaseConnection()
      Test case for the database connection. This test checks if the Database class can establish a valid connection with the database.

      Test output: A non-null Connection object. Preconditions: The database must be running and accessible. Test procedure: 1. Call the setUp method to initialize the connection. 2. Verify that the connection is not null.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up the test environment by closing the connection.
